topic.title: Is ZeroNet dead? I see the latest blog post is posted on 2019
Name.TRUST - A new Free DNS Service For ZeroNet
topic.body:
## Why use [Name.TRUST](/1PtFxzJ8NECkYQzziGWoEfzScD6NiEgqDY) instead of ZeroName?

*   It's free!
*   It's single-BitMessage/WebForm. You don't have to start a local Namecoin client.

## Are there any pitfalls?

*   You have to install the  [Name.TRUST](/1PtFxzJ8NECkYQzziGWoEfzScD6NiEgqDY) plugin to access  [Name.TRUST](/1PtFxzJ8NECkYQzziGWoEfzScD6NiEgqDY) domains;
*   Or you can try [ZeroNet RDP Fork](/1GbHs9D4YvkTHscZPXXwDCWYxW1CHS9rfn);

## Can it work when I'm offline?

Yes! It will. Registered domains are stored in  [Name.TRUST](/1PtFxzJ8NECkYQzziGWoEfzScD6NiEgqDY) site.

## How do I start using it?

Visit [Name.TRUST](/1PtFxzJ8NECkYQzziGWoEfzScD6NiEgqDY). Press Install button to install the plugin. It will ask you to restart ZeroNet, do it. You'll now be able to access Name.TRUST domains, e.g. name.trust, rdp.trust, blog.rdp.trust and others.

If you want to register a domain, scroll down to "How to add a domain?". You will see the steps to register a domain. Make sure there are no typos -- domains can't be unregistered or edit again.

[A new hub for ZeroMe] RDPHub
topic.body:
A new hub for ZeroMe with unlimited storage.

First setup [Name.TRUST](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1628395676_1AmXimBQuPemuoTM9NFYg9Mn5YY6HomhAm), than you will be able to access [hub zite](http://127.0.0.1:43110/hub.rdp.trust)

Why?(my country blocks tor so i enabled Tor Bridge)

1509649171_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
Is there still active development going on?
Or it is dead?
The last closed issue of it's own source seems to be from 2018.

1628395676_1AmXimBQuPemuoTM9NFYg9Mn5YY6H.body:
My server only have ipv6 in access. So early adopters required ipv6 access. In the later stage, although it can be accessed through IPv4, but I still recommend ensuring IPv6 access.
Sometimes the registration system will not work (because I host the server at home, so if my home is out of power, the system will not work. I will try my best to ensure availability)

> [shiruka](#comment_4_1MHdmQEW2HS6sZNgfi3VmtegHc6fUEyVkW): Content.json failed to download

Please ensure you have ipv6 access.

> [shiruka](#comment_4_1MHdmQEW2HS6sZNgfi3VmtegHc6fUEyVkW): Content.json failed to download

Or have tor network access.

> [shiruka](#comment_5_1MHdmQEW2HS6sZNgfi3VmtegHc6fUEyVkW): It says unsupported, i'm on Windows btw

That's a bad news. My ipv4 port is not open because my ISP don't allow that without i pay more money (500+USD).
You can wait, when there is enough both-support ipv4 -ipv6 nodes, you will be able to access.

Schuded maintenance No.1: At GMT+8 time 2021/8/14(Maybe longer), my server will gose into maintenance mode. That means that you will not be able to complete the registration directly on that day, and you may not be able to download the site, but these will continue to work after maintenance（ Registration requests on that day will be postponed until maintenance is completed)
No People likes that?

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1070_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): you can have a nonstop running virtual private Linux server for a few $ monthly [...]

Ok, i know.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1070_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): you can have a nonstop running virtual private Linux server for a few $ monthly [...]

I will create a fork. But that needs serval days. Now I'am working on some repo merge problems, than I will publish to Git Center and then anybody can edit. Now I only opened my fork updater.

???? I'am not copying, I just have a question. I create it with ZeroName source, Zeroname official plugin.I think that is not copying you. I copyed things that nofish do, but is not you.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1485_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Hey, listen. [...]

It just looks like. I just only used some css code by you. You can look at Zeronet\plugins\zeroname , I copyed form there.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1485_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Hey, listen. [...]

I will change the UI and the post, but the name I will not. I think the name is ok.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1485_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Hey, listen. [...]

I've revised a lot of things. Can you remove this comment?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1487_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): That is fine. [...]

Sorry, I just want to copy a config file and edit, but copyed other files. I will delete.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1488_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Let me explain a bit more. I admit some people have done something like that before (read: ZeroVerse & Co). But name services is, again, a whole 'nother story. [...]

I'am ok. This is first time I develop on ZeroNet, but I used python since 2016. This plugin is ok, it will not infect user's computer or do something badly.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1487_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): That is fine. [...]

I'am not just cloned, and run some "sed" command. I just want to copy plugin_info.json in Name.Yo because this is the first time I develop plugin. And then my system copyed file UiRequestPlugin.py then I think it is a part of ZeroName.

> [kaffie](#comment_1172_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): what's needed is a domain name service that's entirely within zeronet. Having external things just leads to points of failure.

I will try. I will create another domain name service within ZeroNet named "Name.Zero" before Oct, 2021.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1489_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Ever heard of metaphors?

Oh....

1628479388_14RgUjbLrwrnCSz1tbWorM5dtsY6e.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_3194_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Likely the site in question is using CoinHive. It's not harmful, but you might not want CPU resources taken up by it if you're running heavy CPU loads already, or have energy consumption concerns.

CoinHive.....That thing is dead, so there is no problem.

> [ice3003](#comment_2_14RgUjbLrwrnCSz1tbWorM5dtsY6eSAjLa): That's the thing, Defender deleted it without a question

You can install a program developed in china named huorong. I use that program to make definder stop. (It will tell you I deleted and you can add a whitelist for your files)

> [styromaniac](#comment_3195_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): I'm wary of China made software. I had two China made apps on my phone and my sites were messed with twice on there. I had to delete and redownload my affected sites to undo the changes, because I can't be too sure ZeroNet detects every file change.

I think that is ok. I all use a lot of china apps, and nothing happend. Some china apps don't like non-china user.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1067_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): this site admin is inactive (will likely not raise your limit soon), you can also delete some of your older content.., you may do it by editing your data.json file (siteaddress/data/users/yourid/...), and then do some signing action like upvoting a comment to publish changes

thankyou! i cleared some oldest content and i have space now.

1628622129_1AmXimBQuPemuoTM9NFYg9Mn5YY6H.body: if you can't press the update button to update, open your data folder, find this site, and then copy-paste "core" folder to your zeronet home.
